text: Tristan Jarry will be the starting goaltender today in New Jersey. Other updates from Coach Sullivan: Letang  Rutta Kapanen and Archibald are all status quo. Everyone else is a game-time decision. https://t.co/ss9HALK1kp
Tristan Jarry will start against New Jersey this afternoon per #Pens HCMS
Tristan Jarry will get the start for the Penguins vs the Devils this afternoon.
